attributes.action: raise a motion in the House " that the Members of this House refuse to accept a salary increase for 2010/2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs have been awarded a 1% salary increase for 2010/2011. Given the economic situation, the number of households who have a reduced income due to redundancies, and also that many workers have seen a pay freeze this year or even a pay reduction, MPs could acknowledge this, take the lead, and not accept a pay rise this financial year.

rejection.details: If you wish for a motion to be raised in the House of Commons, you should contact your local MP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
